name: Tower of the Ice Lich
storyline:
Tower of the Ice Lich has six different playable characters, each with their own reasons for challenging the Lich.

pick your character - enter the tower - read every room and encounter description and pick your action - dice will determine if you are successful in challenges - use luck to reroll important dicerolls - you DIE if your health or sanity reaches 0.

If you can make it to the top of the tower you can challenge the lich

Good luck adventurer
summary: A pixelated homage to 16-bit RPGs, this former print-and-play card game has come full circle as a digital experience! Choose your champion, enter the tower, and make wise decisions on your ascent to face the Ice Lich at the top
